commands.speaker: Honoka
commands.line: There's not much time, so is there anything I can help out with?

commands.speaker: Kotori
commands.line: Well, can you help out over here?

commands.speaker: Honoka
commands.line: Sure! So, what do you want me to do?

commands.speaker: Kotori
commands.line: Can you put cream on these finished treats?

commands.speaker: Honoka
commands.line: An easy job!

commands.speaker: Kotori
commands.line: Thanks, I'd appreciate it.

commands.speaker: Honoka
commands.line: These look tasty. I just had a little Niceoodles a while ago, but that just made me hungrier!

commands.speaker: Kotori
commands.line: Want to have one?

commands.speaker: Honoka
commands.line: I can?!

commands.speaker: Kotori
commands.line: I want to hear what you think, so sure!

commands.speaker: Honoka
commands.line: Thanks! I love you, Kotori!

commands.speaker: Kotori
commands.line: Eheheh, I love you, too.

commands.speaker: Honoka
commands.line: Well, time to chow down! *Munch* How tasty! This is great, Kotori!

commands.speaker: Kotori
commands.line: I'm glad you like it.

commands.speaker: Honoka
commands.line: Ahh, I'm so happy. Asking you to bake was the right choice!

commands.speaker: Kotori
commands.line: Want another?

commands.speaker: Honoka
commands.line: I can have one?!

commands.speaker: Kotori
commands.line: Well, you look like you enjoy them so much, so I can't help it.

commands.speaker: Honoka
commands.line: Sweet! Aww, Kotori, I just love you! Here goes!

commands.speaker: Honoka
commands.line: Om... Mmm, it's like it melts on my tongue. I wish I could eat treats this tasty every day! Kotori, you've gotta marry me!

commands.speaker: Kotori
commands.line: Yeesh, Honoka, you're starting to sound like Chika!

commands.speaker: Honoka
commands.line: But they're just that good!

commands.speaker: Kotori
commands.line: H-Honoka, that's really embarrassing. And here, just decorate this with cream and then we're done.

commands.speaker: Honoka
commands.line: Here we go, and...done!

commands.speaker: Kotori
commands.line: I'm glad we got them done in time. Thanks, Honoka.

commands.speaker: Honoka
commands.line: Good job, Kotori!

commands.speaker: Honoka
commands.line: Looks like everyone's here. Well, time to start the party!
